name: Toustris Puzzle Sovle everything with your fingers
name_original: Toustris Puzzle Sovle everything with your fingers
description:
Toustris Puzzle is one of the famous games in the past. And now, it come to mobile with the new style.

You will not wait for the machine create the block. In this game you create and block to solve the puzzle. Let’s play tetric with new style in your mobile.

Note: Remember all block must linked together.
